text: Papiliotrema is a genus of fungi in the family Tremellaceae. The genus is monotypic, containing the single species Papiliotrema bandonii, found in Portugal. More than 20 species have been reported under Papiliotrema. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Tremellomycetes Category:Fungi of Europe Category:Monotypic Basidiomycota genera
title: Papiliotrema
